name: BPM Senior Analyst
description:
Job description:

  • Work as part of an agile application team to build a large-scale, micro-services application. The application is the modernization of an existing application that runs daily on a tight schedule.
  • Provide oversight on BPM architectures and solutions;
  • Build and review BPMN 2.0 process models;
  • Supervise BPM platform implementation;
  • Gather business and system business requirements for BPM solution;
  • Translate requirements into a plan and create tasks for the development team;
  • Keep project documentation up to date.

Qualifications:

  • Experience with Camunda BPM tools or related platforms (ELMA,jBPM);
  • 2+ years experience in system/business analyst role;
  • Knowledge of Rest APIs;
  • Strong background in building applications using Java, Spring boot, JSON, SOAP/REST protocols;
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced, outcomes-driven environment;
  • Willingness to deep dive into BPM area.
